ComicInfo.Title: Don't Look Behind; Man from the Grave; Gallery of Horror; The Cannibal!; The Recluse; The Fearful Night
ComicInfo.Summary:
Don't Look Behind: A man who ordinarily terrorizes others finds himself stalked by a shadowy killer. The perpetrator turns out to be the supernatural embodiment of the victim's own evil nature.
Man from the Grave: In India a man is released from a grave sealed for a very long time. He is alive and lives for another two years.
Gallery of Horror: Weird facts
The Cannibal!: A policeman worries about the girl he loves, as there is a cannibal on the loose. It turns out that he needn't worry about her, but should fear for his own safety.
The Recluse: A woman marries an ugly old recluse who is reputed to have a fortune stashed in his home. He knows that she only wants the money, but he will have to be forced to reveal its location.
The Fearful Night: A man tries to steal a treasure from witches, but inadvertently becomes their pawn.
